title: Earl Thomas Conley-Treadin' Water
description:
It is difficult to categorize Earl Thomas conley&#039;s musical style. Some of his songs sound more traditional than others, but they are all of a remarkably high quality. Earl sings mostly love ballads, sometimes sad and sometimes philosophical.   He wrote most of his own songs. 










1984  rip at 320 kbps









Track list

01-Too Hot To Handle 
02-Love Don&#039;t Care (Whose Heart It Breaks) 
03-Labor Of Love 
04-Your Love Says All There Is 
05-Love&#039;s On The Move Again 
06-Chance Of Lovin&#039; You 
07-Honor Bound 
08-Treadin&#039; Water 
09-Feels Like A Saturday Night 
10-Turn This Bus Around.
